name: modularize
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to design or produce something in separate sections

example.eg: They have modularized their code, so you use just what you need.
example.egtrans: 他们已经将代码模块化，所以你可以直接使用你所需要的那部分。

trans_examp.trans_en: to design an educational course as a series of modules (= separate units) that can be combined in different ways
